author: A_Brickset_user
title: A non-lego varient, pretty ritzy!
review:
This is a good set because it comes with the mini-soccer ball liable to play with. The bus is pretty good but probably too big to fit on average lego road plates. I got the red one, but this one couldnt be much differant. The mini-figs are occasionally boring with the same suits but lots of good hair pieces, all cut though.
 I like the Johnny Thunder guy. The bus has room for a soccer ball up top but i just say forgettabout it. Its just too rattly. The buses sliding thing with all the minifigs is pretty neat, an engenious idea at the most. I recommned this set if you want a good inflatable soccer ball, a new LEGO soccer team, and an extra vehicle. Chow.

author: starwarsgeek101_
title: Great price, Great product!
review: This product is a great gift for any child or adult. The soccerball (football)can bounce very high and the bus is good too. There is nothing bad about this product in any way! I wold buy this set than the original 3405 because of the extra soccer ball and it is worth it! Great product, highly recommend!
